name: fidmilite
description:
fidmilite is a simple light manipulating puzzle game.

play 18 different levels, with18 different challenges

use 10 different objects, with 10 unique functionalities, and combine them in every conceivable way to beat the game

                                                                            

shoots colored light

filter lights into different colors

needs respective colored lights

blocks progress unless beamed with the correct light

split lights into two

combines lights to create new colors

redirect lights

credits
